item.title: 菲律宾在南海与美国在其权利安全顾问范围内巡逻
item.description:
The Philippines' joint patrols with the United States in the South China Sea are within Manila's rights, and it will continue to support a free and open Indo-Pacific, its national security adviser said on Friday.翻译:菲律宾国家安全顾问周五表示，菲律宾与美国在南中国海进行联合巡逻是马尼拉的权利，并将继续支持自由开放的印太地区。

The Southeast Asian nation rejects China's assertion that the Philippines enlisted "foreign forces" to patrol the South China Sea, National Security Adviser Eduardo Año said in a statement, responding to Beijing's remarks.翻译:国家安全顾问爱德华多·阿诺在一份声明中回应北京的言论时表示，这个东南亚国家拒绝接受中国关于菲律宾招募“ 外国军队”在南海巡逻的说法。

"The Philippines is not stirring up trouble," Defence Secretary Gilberto Teodoro told reporters. "Our interests are to protect our rights."翻译:“菲律宾没有挑起事端，”国防部长吉尔伯托·特奥多罗告诉记者。 “我们的利益就是保护我们的权利。”

Teodoro said there will be several iterations of joint patrols moving forward.翻译:特奥多罗表示，未来将进行多次联合巡逻。

The treaty allies conducted joint patrols from Tuesday to Thursday in waters near Taiwan and the South China Sea within Manila's exclusive economic zone (EEZ), fanning further tensions with China.翻译:周二至周四，这两个条约盟国在马尼拉专属经济区（EEZ）内的台湾附近海域和南中国海进行了联合巡逻，加剧了与中国的紧张关系。

China claims most of the South China Sea on the basis of a "nine-dash line" that stretches as far as 1,500 km (900 miles) south of its mainland, cutting into the EEZs of rival claimants Brunei, Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines and Vietnam.翻译:中国以“九段线”为基础对南海大部分地区拥有主权，该线延伸至其大陆以南1,500公里（900英里），切入了其他声索国文莱、印度尼西亚、马来西亚和菲律宾的专属经济区和越南。

A 2016 arbitral ruling invalidated the claim of China, which does not acknowledge the court's decision.翻译:2016年的仲裁裁决宣告中国的主张无效，但中国不承认法院的裁决。

Reporting by Neil Jerome Morales and Mikhail Flores; Editing by Jamie Freed翻译:尼尔·杰罗姆·莫拉莱斯和米哈伊尔·弗洛雷斯报道；杰米·弗里德编辑

item.title: 郭台铭退出台总统竞选，富士康松了口气
item.description:
Terry Gou, the billionaire founder of tech giant Foxconn (2317.TW), on Friday withdrew from the race to be Taiwan's next president, bringing a sense of relief to the major Apple (AAPL.O) supplier and iPhone manufacturer, sources said.翻译:消息人士称，科技巨头富士康(2317.TW)的亿万富翁创始人郭台铭周五退出了台湾下一任总统的竞选，这给苹果(AAPL.O)主要供应商和 iPhone 制造商带来了一丝安慰。

Gou announced his bid in August, saying he wanted to unite the opposition and ensure the island did not become "the next Ukraine", blaming the ruling Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) for taking Taiwan to the brink of war by antagonising China, which claims the island as its own territory.翻译:郭台铭在八月宣布参选，称他希望团结反对派，确保台湾不会成为“下一个乌克兰”，并指责执政的民进党通过对抗中国将台湾推向战争边缘。将该岛视为自己的领土。

Gou, who only got the go-ahead from the election commission last week after collecting enough valid signatures to run as an independent, said in a statement he was "withdrawing his body but not his spirit".翻译:郭台铭上周在收集了足够的有效签名以独立人士身份参选后才获得选举委员会的批准，他在一份声明中表示，他“撤回了他的身体，但没有撤回他的精神”。

"STOP, RESET, RESTART," he added, using English.翻译:“停止、重置、重新启动，”他用英语补充道。

He did not specify what he would do next in the presidential campaign or who he might back - Hou Yu-ih from Taiwan's largest opposition party the Kuomintang (KMT), or former Taipei mayor Ko Wen-je from the much smaller Taiwan People's Party (TPP).翻译:”跨太平洋伙伴关系协定）。

"Must win! All right? Complete the change of power and change Taiwan," Gou said.翻译:“一定要赢！好吗？完成权力更迭，改变台湾，”郭台铭说。

Ko offered his thanks to Gou in a comment on Gou's Facebook page.翻译:柯在郭台铭的 Facebook 页面上发表评论，表达了对郭台铭的感谢。

"We will definitely win!" Ko added.翻译:“我们一定会赢！”柯补充道。

Despite a massive advertising campaign, which saw his face plastered across Taiwan, Gou consistently polled far behind his rivals.翻译:尽管进行了大规模的广告宣传活动，郭台铭的脸贴满了台湾，但他的民意调查始终远远落后于他的竞争对手。

Although Gou stepped down as Foxconn chief in 2019 and resigned as a board member in early September, he remained the company's largest shareholder.翻译:尽管郭台铭于2019年辞去富士康董事长一职，并于9月初辞去董事会成员职务，但他仍然是该公司第一大股东。

But Gou, one of Taiwan's most high-profile business figures internationally, largely vanished from public view after a Chinese newspaper reported last month that China was investigating Foxconn over taxes and other issues.翻译:但在一家中国报纸上个月报道中国正在就税收和其他问题调查​​富士康后，郭台铭这位台湾在国际上最引人注目的商业人物之一基本上从公众视野中消失了。

The report, in the strongly nationalist Global Times, implied Beijing was unhappy Gou might split the opposition vote, potentially ensuring a victory for the DPP's candidate Lai Ching-te, who is leading in the polls.翻译:强烈民族主义的《环球时报》的这篇报道暗示，北京对郭台铭可能分裂反对派选票感到不满，这有可能确保在民调中领先的民进党候选人赖清德获胜。

Gou's decision on Friday came as a relief for Foxconn's senior management, which had assessed scenarios for potential contingency plans after news of the Chinese inquiry, two people close to Foxconn told Reuters.翻译:两名接近富士康的人士告诉路透社，郭台铭周五的决定让富士康的高级管理层松了一口气，在中国调查的消息传出后，他们已经评估了潜在应急计划的情况。

"It's a sigh of relief," said one of the sources, who declined to be identified due to the sensitivity of the matter.翻译:“这让人松了一口气，”一位消息人士表示，由于此事的敏感性，该消息人士拒绝透露姓名。

"We were previously a little bit unsettled, but this basically puts an end to it," the person said, referring to worries about an escalation of the investigation, which could further affect its operations in China.翻译:这位人士表示：“我们之前有点不安，但这基本上结束了。”他指的是对调查升级的担忧，这可能会进一步影响其在中国的业务。

Foxconn declined to comment.翻译:富士康拒绝置评。

Foxconn Chairman Young Liu told an earnings call last week that the company has "prepared for all possible cases", when asked about potential political risks to the company from Gou's election bid.翻译:当被问及郭台铭竞选给公司带来的潜在政治风险时，富士康董事长刘扬在上周的财报电话会议上表示，该公司已经“为所有可能的情况做好了准备”。

Gou had tried to broker talks between the KMT and TPP to run together against the DPP, but those efforts imploded late Thursday after an angry showdown between leaders from the opposition parties in front of reporters and shown live on Taiwanese television channels at a conference room in a Taipei hotel.翻译:郭台铭曾试图斡旋国民党和跨太平洋伙伴关系党之间的谈判，共同对抗民进党，但这些努力在周四晚间破裂，因为反对党领导人在记者面前愤怒地摊牌，并在台湾电视频道的一间会议室进行了现场直播。台北的一家酒店。

Gou's running mate, the actress Tammy Lai, who starred in a high-profile Netflix drama, had to give up her U.S. citizenship to stand with him.翻译:郭台铭的竞选搭档、女演员黎悦怡 (Tammy Lai) 曾主演一部备受瞩目的 Netflix 电视剧，她不得不放弃美国国籍才能与郭台铭站在一起。

She has no plans to regain her U.S. passport, Lai' office said.翻译:黎智英办公室表示，她没有计划重新获得美国护照。

Reporting by Yimou Lee and Ben Blanchard; Additional reporting by Sarah Wu; Editing by Muralikumar Anantharaman and Gerry Doyle翻译:Yimou Lee 和 Ben Blanchard 的报道；莎拉·吴 (Sarah Wu) 的补充报道； Muralikumar Anantharaman 和 Gerry Doyle 编辑

item.title: 中国应对呼吸道疾病高峰；世卫组织称未发现异常病原体
item.description:
China called for vigilance on Friday as a surge of respiratory illness hit schools and hospitals and the World Health Organization, which has asked the government for disease data, said no unusual or novel pathogens had been detected.翻译:周五，随着呼吸道疾病激增袭击学校和医院，中国呼吁保持警惕，世界卫生组织已要求政府提供疾病数据，表示尚未发现异常或新型病原体。

China is grappling with a spike in respiratory illnesses as it enters its first full winter season since it lifted strict COVID-19 restrictions in December, with cases among children appearing especially high in northern areas like Beijing and Liaoning province where hospitals are warning of long waits.翻译:中国正面临呼吸道疾病激增的问题，自去年 12 月取消严格的 COVID-19 限制以来，中国进入了第一个完整的冬季，其中北京和辽宁省等北方地区的儿童病例数量尤其多，医院警告称，这些地区的儿童病例可能需要长时间等待。

The State Council said influenza would peak this winter and spring and mycoplasma pneumoniae infection would continue to be high in some areas in future. It also warned of the risk of a rebound in COVID infections.翻译:国务院表示，今冬春季流感高峰期，未来部分地区肺炎支原体感染仍将持续高发。它还警告了新冠病毒感染反弹的风险。

"All localities should strengthen information reporting on infectious diseases to ensure information is reported in a timely and accurate manner," the State Council said in a statement.翻译:国务院在一份声明中表示：“各地要加强传染病信息报告，确保信息报告及时、准确。”

The situation came into the spotlight this week when the WHO asked China for more information, citing a report by the Program for Monitoring Emerging Diseases (ProMED) on clusters of undiagnosed pneumonia in children.翻译:本周，当世界卫生组织援引新发疾病监测计划（ProMED）关于儿童未确诊肺炎群的报告要求中国提供更多信息时，这一情况成为人们关注的焦点。

Both China and the WHO have faced questions about the transparency of reporting on the earliest COVID-19 cases that emerged in the central city of Wuhan in late 2019.翻译:中国和世界卫生组织都面临着关于 2019 年底在中部城市武汉出现的最早的 COVID-19 病例报告透明度的质疑。

On Thursday, the WHO said China had responded to its request and the data it provided suggested the cases were linked to the lifting of COVID curbs along with the circulation of known pathogens like mycoplasma pneumoniae, a common bacterial infection that typically affects children, which has circulated since May.翻译:周四，世界卫生组织表示，中国已回应其要求，其提供的数据表明，这些病例与取消新冠疫情限制以及肺炎支原体等已知病原体的传播有关，肺炎支原体是一种常见的细菌感染，通常影响儿童， 5月以来流传。

This month, authorities began issuing health advisories and warning the public of long waits at crowded hospitals but they have not imposed measures like the ones during the COVID pandemic, such as masks or closing schools.翻译:本月，当局开始发布健康建议，并警告公众不要在拥挤的医院里长时间等待，但他们没有采取像新冠病毒大流行期间那样的措施，例如戴口罩或关闭学校。

There has been no indication of any undue public alarm.翻译:没有迹象表明任何公众过度恐慌。

Bruce Thompson, head of the Melbourne School of Health Sciences at the University of Melbourne, said very preliminary data suggested there was nothing out of the ordinary.翻译:墨尔本大学墨尔本健康科学学院院长布鲁斯·汤普森表示，非常初步的数据表明没有什么异常。

"At this stage, there is nothing to suggest that it may be a new variant of COVID," he said.翻译:他说：“现阶段，没有任何迹象表明它可能是新冠病毒的新变种。”

"One thing to note is that we can be reassured that the surveillance processes are working, which is a very good thing."翻译:“值得注意的是，我们可以放心，监控流程正在发挥作用，这是一件非常好的事情。”

Parents in Shanghai on Friday said they were not overly concerned about the wave of sickness, saying while it appeared to be more severe, they expected it to blow over soon.翻译:周五，上海的家长们表示，他们并不太担心这波疫情，虽然疫情看起来更加严重，但他们预计疫情很快就会过去。

"Colds happen all over the world," said Emily Wu outside a children's hospital. "I hope that people will not be biased because of the pandemic ... but look at this from a scientific perspective."翻译:“世界各地都会发生感冒，”艾米丽·吴在儿童医院外说道。 “我希望人们不会因为疫情而产生偏见……但要从科学的角度看待这个问题。”

Another mother, Feng Zixun, said she was making her eight-year-old son wear a mask and wash his hands more often but nothing much more.翻译:另一位母亲冯子勋说，她只是让八岁的儿子戴口罩、勤洗手，仅此而已。

"It's not that bad, there are more children falling sick now but it's mainly an issue of protection," she said.翻译:“情况并没有那么糟糕，现在有更多的孩子生病，但这主要是一个保护问题，”她说。

Reporting by Andrew Silver and Nicoco Chan in Shanghai and the Beijing Newsroom; writing by Brenda Goh; editing by Robert Birsel翻译:Andrew Silver 和 Nicoco Chan 在上海和北京新闻编辑室的报道；布伦达·吴 (Brenda Goh) 撰写；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑

item.title: 谁将竞选台湾下一任总统？
item.description:
Taiwan will vote on Jan. 13 in presidential and parliamentary elections, held once every four years.翻译:台湾将于1月13日举行每四年举行一次的总统和议会选举。

President Tsai Ing-wen is barred by the constitution from standing against after two terms in office.翻译:宪法禁止蔡英文总统在两届任期后参选。

Here is a list of the candidates standing for president:

LAI CHING-TE

Lai, also widely known by his English name William, is running for the ruling Democratic Progressive Party (DPP). Currently Taiwan's vice president, he is also the DPP's chairman, and has consistently led opinion polls.翻译:黎智英的英文名William也广为人知，他正在竞选执政的民进党（DPP）。现任台湾副总统，同时也是民进党主席，在民意调查中一直领先。

Lai, along with Tsai, has repeatedly offered talks with China but have been rebuffed, as Beijing views them both as separatists.翻译:黎智英和蔡英文曾多次提出与中国进行会谈，但均遭到拒绝，因为北京将他们视为分裂分子。

Lai, 64, and Tsai say only Taiwan's people can decide their future.翻译:64 岁的黎智英和蔡英文表示，只有台湾人民才能决定他们的未来。

His running mate is Hsiao Bi-khim, Taiwan's high-profile former de facto ambassador to the United States.

HOU YU-IH

Hou, 66, is the candidate for Taiwan's main opposition party the Kuomintang (KMT), whose government fled to the island in 1949 after losing a civil war with Mao Zedong's Communists.翻译:66 岁的侯是台湾主要反对党国民党的候选人，国民党政府在与毛泽东领导的共产党的内战中失败后于 1949 年逃往台湾。

Hou is the mayor of Taipei's neighbouring city New Taipei, though he has taken a leave of absence to run for president. He was re-elected as the mayor in a landslide last year.翻译:侯是台北邻近城市新北的市长，不过他已经请假竞选总统。去年他以压倒性优势再次当选市长。

The KMT traditionally favours closer ties with China but strongly denies being pro-Beijing. Hou has said he will restart talks with Beijing.翻译:国民党传统上倾向于与中国建立更密切的关系，但强烈否认亲北京。侯先生表示，他将重启与北京的谈判。

His running mate is the fiery media personality Jaw Shaw-kong.

KO WEN-JE

Ko, a former Taipei mayor, is the candidate for the small Taiwan People's Party.翻译:柯曾任台北市市长，是小型台湾人民党的候选人。

He had been talking to the KMT about a joint ticket to take on the DPP, but those talks collapsed this week in bitter disagreement.翻译:他一直在与国民党讨论联合竞选对抗民进党的问题，但本周谈判因激烈分歧而破裂。

Ko, 64, has chosen as his vice presidential candidate one of the party's lawmakers, Cynthia Wu, whose family is a major shareholder of conglomerate Shin Kong Group.翻译:64 岁的柯选择了党内议员之一吴辛西娅 (Cynthia Wu) 作为副总统候选人，吴辛西娅的家族是新光集团的主要股东。

Ko and Hou have both been battling for second spot in opinion polls behind Lai.翻译:柯和侯一直在民意调查中争夺第二名，仅次于黎智英。

Writing by Ben Blanchard. Editing by Gerry Doyle翻译:本·布兰查德撰写。格里·多伊尔编辑

item.title: 法国外长表示法国致力于与中国对话
item.description:
France is committed to dialogue with China, French Foreign Minister Catherine Colonna said on Friday, affirming ties after a European Union anti-subsidy probe backed by Paris into Chinese-made electric vehicles rankled Beijing.翻译:法国外交部长凯瑟琳·科隆纳周五表示，法国致力于与中国对话，在巴黎支持的欧盟对中国制造的电动汽车进行反补贴调查激怒了北京之后，法国重申了两国关系。

Colonna's visit to the Chinese capital, centred around encouraging exchanges between citizens of both countries such as students and tourists, has threatened to be overshadowed by trade issues in the wake of the EV investigation, which Beijing has blasted as "protectionist".翻译:科隆纳对中国首都的访问主要是鼓励学生和游客等两国公民之间的交流，但在电动汽车调查之后，贸易问题的影响可能会被掩盖，北京方面将调查斥为“保护主义”。

"We are really committed to dialogue with China," Colonna told China's Premier Li Qiang, adding that she was "honoured" and "happy" to see him after their Paris meeting in June.翻译:“我们确实致力于与中国对话，”科隆纳告诉中国总理李强，并补充说，她在六月巴黎会晤后见到他感到“荣幸”和“高兴”。

In a post on X, formerly known as Twitter, Colonna repeated that she was "honoured" to have been received by Li.翻译:在 X（以前称为 Twitter）上的一篇帖子中，科隆纳重申，她“很荣幸”受到李的接待。

"With China, we are working to find answers to global climate, biodiversity and debt challenges, and to deepen and rebalance our economic relationship," she wrote.翻译:她写道：“我们正在与中国一起努力寻找应对全球气候、生物多样性和债务挑战的答案，并深化和重新平衡我们的经济关系。”

Colonna's trip precedes a visit by the European Commission and Council presidents, Ursula von der Leyen and Charles Michel, to Beijing in early December for the first in-person summit with President Xi Jinping in four years, after China-EU relations nosedived during the pandemic.翻译:科隆纳此行之前，欧盟委员会和理事会主席乌尔苏拉·冯德莱恩和查尔斯·米歇尔将于 12 月初访问北京，与习近平主席进行四年来的首次面对面峰会，此前中欧关系在疫情期间急转直下。

European officials have repeatedly vowed to reduce economic dependencies on China in critical sectors - otherwise known as "de-risking" - in the face of what the G7 calls China's "economic coercion".翻译:面对七国集团所谓的中国“经济胁迫”，欧洲官员一再发誓要减少关键领域对中国的经济依赖，也称为“去风险”。

French President Emmanuel Macron, who met with Xi in China earlier this year, has argued the EU should stop being naive and demand a level playing field with countries like China, and had been pushing the European Commission behind the scenes to launch the probe.翻译:法国总统马克龙今年早些时候在中国会见了习近平，他认为欧盟不应再天真，要求与中国等国家建立公平的竞争环境，并一直在幕后推动欧盟委员会启动调查。

China is France's third-largest trade partner, but French and other European firms are deeply concerned about China's vast trade imbalance with the EU, its opaque legislation on cross-border data transfers and cheap Chinese EVs flooding the European market, threatening domestic carmakers.翻译:中国是法国第三大贸易伙伴，但法国和其他欧洲企业对中国与欧盟巨大的贸易不平衡、跨境数据传输立法不透明以及廉价的中国电动汽车充斥欧洲市场、威胁国内汽车制造商深感担忧。

France is also concerned about Chinese attempts to force French cosmetics companies to share manufacturing secrets with Chinese parties.翻译:法国还对中国试图迫使法国化妆品公司与中方分享制造秘密感到担忧。

France is China's top source of cosmetics and wine imports, according to China's customs agency, with French luxury titans such as LMVH (LVMH.PA) particularly dependent on Chinese consumers. The lack of a strong rebound in luxury demand following China's post-pandemic re-opening has spooked investors.翻译:据中国海关称，法国是中国最大的化妆品和葡萄酒进口来源地，LMVH (LVMH.PA)等法国奢侈品巨头尤其依赖中国消费者。中国疫情后重新开放后奢侈品需求缺乏强劲反弹令投资者感到恐慌。

Xi insisted that China welcomes investment from French firms in a telephone call on Monday with Macron, who urged fair treatment for foreign companies in China.翻译:习近平在周一与马克龙的电话中坚称中国欢迎法国企业投资，马克龙敦促公平对待在华外国企业。

The Chinese premier, in his meeting with Colonna, took an upbeat stance on broader bilateral ties.翻译:中国总理在会见科隆纳时对更广泛的双边关系采取了乐观立场。

"Under the strategic leadership of President Xi Jinping and President Macron, the relationship between China and France has been developing better and better in all aspects since this year," Li said.翻译:李克强表示，今年以来，在习近平主席和马克龙总统的战略引领下，中法关系各方面发展越来越好。

"Next year will be the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and France, and both of us are sustaining our efforts in the hope that the 60th year would see a big development and a big breakthrough."翻译:明年是中法建交60周年，我们双方都在继续努力，希望60年能够有大发展、大突破。

item.title: 大众汽车将推出针对中国的入门级电动平台
item.description:
Volkswagen (VOWG_p.DE) said on Friday it will develop a new platform for entry-level electric vehicles in China and use more local components to lower costs, as the German company seeks to regain lost ground in the world's biggest auto market.翻译:大众汽车(VOWG_p.DE)周五表示，它将在中国开发一个用于入门级电动汽车的新平台，并使用更多本地零部件来降低成本，这家德国公司寻求收复全球最大汽车市场的失地。

The new architecture, known as the A Main Platform, will be made specifically to Chinese consumer tastes with regards to the battery, electric drive and electric motor, China chief Ralf Brandstaetter told reporters during a visit to its new EV development and procurement centre in the central city of Hefei.翻译:中国区总裁拉尔夫·布兰德斯塔特(Ralf Brandstaetter)在参观其位于印度的新电动汽车开发和采购中心时告诉记者，被称为“A主平台”的新架构将专门针对中国消费者在电池、电力驱动和电动机方面的品味而设计。中心城市合肥。

Chinese new car buyers are younger, tech savvy and like a immersive digital experience from their cars, he added.翻译:他补充说，中国新车购买者更年轻，懂科技，喜欢汽车带来的沉浸式数字体验。

Derived from the so-called modular electric drive matrix (MEB), Volkswagen's existing electric-only platform in use since 2019, it will primarily use Chinese suppliers and should be ready for market in 2026, a third faster than previous platform development times, he added.翻译:他表示，该平台源自所谓的模块化电动驱动矩阵（MEB），这是大众汽车自 2019 年以来使用的现有纯电动平台，将主要使用中国供应商，预计将于 2026 年上市，比之前的平台开发时间快三分之一。添加。

The company has said it plans to introduce 10 more EV models globally by 2026 and speed up its time to market for new models from four years to closer to the 2.5-year average for its Chinese counterparts.翻译:该公司表示，计划到 2026 年在全球再推出10 款电动车型，并将新车型的上市时间从 4 年缩短到接近中国同行 2.5 年的平均水平。

China was a very “price-sensitive” market and Volkswagen needed to optimise costs, Brandstaetter said.翻译:布兰德斯塔特表示，中国是一个“价格非常敏感”的市场，大众汽车需要优化成本。

“When (EV) volume goes up, … it’s important that we are profitable to be sustainable. Therefore we drive the technologies, the speed and cost efficiency."翻译:“当（电动汽车）销量上升时……我们必须盈利才能可持续发展。因此，我们推动技术、速度和成本效率。”

Ludger Luehrmann, chief technology officer of the Hefei centre that is called Volkswagen Group China Technology Company (VCTC) and is developing the platform, said for example that the company was able to lower the price of its dashboard displays by 37% after switching to a Chinese supplier from a global one.翻译:正在开发该平台的大众汽车集团中国科技公司（VCTC）合肥中心首席技术官 Ludger Luehrmann 表示，例如，在改用来自全球的中国供应商。

Volkswagen ceded its title as the best-selling car brand in China to BYD (002594.SZ) late last year, due to intense competition with local EV makers and its heavy reliance on gasoline vehicles whose sales have been declining in the country.翻译:去年年底，由于大众汽车与本土电动汽车制造商的激烈竞争以及对汽油车的严重依赖，而汽油车在中国的销量一直在下降，大众汽车将其中国最畅销汽车品牌的头衔让给了比亚迪(002594.SZ) 。

Its top-selling EV, the ID.3, ranked 22nd among EV models by sales in China this year after big discounts boosted its monthly sales to around 10,000 during July to October from an average of 2,200 per month last year, according to industry data.

ENTRY-LEVEL MODELS

Volkswagen is pushing to expand its product range in China to attract customers in the entry- and mid-level segment of EVs in particular, with its current offering priced above that of many Chinese electric-only rivals.翻译:大众汽车正在努力扩大其在中国的产品范围，特别是吸引入门级和中级电动汽车领域的客户，其目前的产品价格高于许多中国纯电动竞争对手。

It plans to develop four models priced between 140,000 yuan ($19,400) and 170,000 yuan on the new platform to compete with rivals in a segment dominated by gasoline cars currently, Brandstaetter said.翻译:Brandstaetter 表示，该公司计划在新平台上开发四款售价在 14 万元（19,400 美元）至 17 万元之间的车型，以与目前由汽油车主导的细分市场中的竞争对手竞争。

The cars would be produced by Volkswagen's joint ventures with SAIC (600104.SS) and FAW, he added.翻译:他补充说，这些汽车将由大众汽车与上汽集团（600104.SS）和一汽集团的合资企业生产。

Volkswagen invested around 1 billion euros ($1.1 billion) to build VCTC, which it says is crucial to its 'China for China strategy' and will eventually employ over 2,000 people.翻译:大众汽车投资约 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元）建立 VCTC，该公司表示，这对其“中国为中国战略”至关重要，最终将雇用 2,000 多名员工。

The centre's operations include coordinating procurement to involve suppliers early on, and linking up the development projects of Volkswagen's three joint ventures in China with SAIC, FAW and JAC Motors.翻译:该中心的业务包括协调采购以尽早让供应商参与进来，以及将大众汽车在中国的三个合资企业与上汽、一汽和江淮汽车的开发项目联系起来。

The centre meant that "time-consuming coordination across time zones with developers in Germany is no longer necessary," Brandstaetter said.翻译:布兰德斯塔特表示，该中心意味着“不再需要与德国开发商进行耗时的跨时区协调”。

"We will increase the efficiency of our development processes and be able to shorten the time it takes to bring products to Chinese customers by 30%, while ensuring we are catering to their specific needs."翻译:“我们将提高开发流程的效率，并将产品交付给中国客户的时间缩短 30%，同时确保满足他们的特定需求。”

Volkswagen in July struck a deal with Chinese EV maker Xpeng Inc (9868.HK) to boost its EV line up. It has two new models under development as part of that partnership that will target mid-level consumers and be produced on an older generation Xpeng platform. Those models are set to be rolled out from 2026.翻译:大众汽车于 7 月与中国电动汽车制造商小鹏汽车（9868.HK）达成协议，以扩大其电动汽车产品线。作为该合作伙伴关系的一部分，该公司正在开发两款新车型，这些车型将针对中端消费者，并在老一代小鹏汽车平台上生产。这些型号将于 2026 年开始推出。

($1 = 7.2111 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2111 人民币）

item.title: 中国称世卫组织询问呼吸道疫情后未发现异常病原体
item.description:
Chinese health authorities have not detected any unusual or novel pathogens and provided the requested data on an increase in respiratory illnesses and reported clusters of pneumonia in children, the World Health Organization (WHO) said on Thursday.翻译:世界卫生组织（WHO）周四表示，中国卫生当局尚未发现任何异常或新型病原体，并提供了所要求的有关呼吸道疾病增加和报告的儿童聚集性肺炎的数据。

The WHO had asked China for more information on Wednesday after groups including the Program for Monitoring Emerging Diseases (ProMED) reported clusters of undiagnosed pneumonia in children in north China.翻译:在包括新发疾病监测计划（ProMED）在内的组织报告中国北方儿童出现聚集性未确诊肺炎后，世界卫生组织周三要求中国提供更多信息。

As per the rule, China responded to the WHO within 24 hours. The WHO had sought epidemiologic and clinical information as well as laboratory results through the International Health Regulations mechanism.翻译:按照规定，中方将在24小时内向世界卫生组织做出回应。世卫组织已通过《国际卫生条例》机制寻求流行病学和临床信息以及实验室结果。

The data suggests the increase is linked to the lifting of COVID-19 restrictions along with the circulation of known pathogens like mycoplasma pneumoniae, a common bacterial infection that typically affects younger children and which has circulated since May.翻译:数据表明，感染人数的增加与 COVID-19 限制的解除以及肺炎支原体等已知病原体的传播有关，肺炎支原体是一种常见的细菌感染，通常影响年幼的儿童，自 5 月份以来一直在传播。

Influenza, respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) and adenovirus have been in circulation since October.翻译:流感、呼吸道合胞病毒（RSV）和腺病毒自十月以来一直在传播。

The agency does not advise against travel and trade as they have been monitoring the situation with authorities.翻译:该机构不建议反对旅行和贸易，因为他们一直在与当局一起监测情况。

No unusual pathogens have been detected in the capital of Beijing and the northeastern province of Liaoning.翻译:首都北京和东北部辽宁省未发现异常病原体。

Chinese authorities from the National Health Commission held a press conference on Nov. 13 to report an increase in incidence of respiratory disease.翻译:11月13日，国家卫健委召开新闻发布会，通报呼吸道疾病发病率上升情况。

Both China and the WHO have faced questions about the transparency of reporting on the earliest COVID-19 cases that emerged in the central Chinese city of Wuhan in late 2019.翻译:中国和世界卫生组织都面临着关于 2019 年底在中国中部城市武汉出现的最早的 COVID-19 病例报告透明度的质疑。

The U.N. health agency had also asked China for further information about trends in the circulation of known pathogens and the burden on healthcare systems. The WHO said it was in contact with clinicians and scientists through its existing technical partnerships and networks in China.翻译:联合国卫生机构还要求中国提供有关已知病原体传播趋势和医疗系统负担的进一步信息。世界卫生组织表示，它正在通过其在中国现有的技术合作伙伴关系和网络与临床医生和科学家保持联系。

WHO China said it was "routine" to request information on increases in respiratory illnesses and reported clusters of pneumonia in children from member states, such as China.翻译:世界卫生组织驻华代表处表示，向中国等成员国索取有关呼吸道疾病增加情况和报告的儿童聚集性肺炎的信息是“例行公事”。

The global agency decided to issue a statement on China to share available information, as it received a number of queries about it from media, WHO China said in an emailed statement.翻译:世界卫生组织驻华代表处在一份电子邮件声明中表示，由于收到媒体的一些询问，该全球机构决定发表一份关于中国的声明，以分享现有信息。

The ProMED alert was based on a report by FTV News in Taiwan that came out on Tuesday.翻译:ProMED 警报是基于台湾 FTV News 周二发布的一篇报道。

Undiagnosed pneumonia was not mentioned at last week's press conference, according to a transcript, but one speaker said everyone felt like there had been an increase in respiratory illnesses this year compared with three years ago.翻译:根据一份文字记录，上周的新闻发布会上没有提到未确诊的肺炎，但一位发言者表示，每个人都觉得今年的呼吸道疾病与三年前相比有所增加。

The speaker said that global monitoring for mycoplasma pneumoniae had been at a low over the past three years and outbreaks were cyclical, occurring every three to seven years.

'SEASONAL SURGE'

The rise in respiratory illnesses comes as China braces for its first full winter season since it had lifted strict COVID-19 restrictions in December. Many other countries saw similar increases in respiratory diseases after easing pandemic measures.翻译:呼吸道疾病的增加正值中国准备迎接自去年 12 月取消严格的 COVID-19 限制以来的第一个完整冬季。在放松大流行措施后，许多其他国家的呼吸道疾病也出现了类似的增加。

"It is just a relatively large seasonal surge, perhaps partly due to chance and partly because there's a bit of 'immunity debt' from the lesser winter surges in the last three years," said Ben Cowling, an epidemiologist at Hong Kong University.翻译:香港大学流行病学家本·考林表示：“这只是一次相对较大的季节性激增，可能部分是偶然，部分是因为过去三年冬季疫情较少，造成了一些‘免疫债’。”

China's National Health Commission did not immediately respond to a request for comment.翻译:中国国家卫生健康委员会没有立即回应置评请求。

On Thursday, it published an interview with the state media agency Xinhua in which it advised parents what to do and mentioned that big hospitals were receiving a large number of patients and waiting times were long. It did not comment on the WHO notice.翻译:周四，它发表了接受官方媒体新华社的采访，其中建议家长该怎么做，并提到大医院接收大量患者，等待时间很长。它没有对世界卫生组织的通知发表评论。

Since mid-October, the WHO said northern China had reported an increase in influenza-like illness compared with the same period in the previous three years.翻译:自10月中旬以来，世界卫生组织表示，与前三年同期相比，中国北方报告的流感样疾病有所增加。

It said China had systems in place to capture information on trends in illness incidence and to report that data to platforms such as the Global Influenza Surveillance and Response System.翻译:报告称，中国已建立系统来获取有关疾病发病率趋势的信息，并将这些数据报告给全球流感监测和应对系统等平台。

In recent days, media in cities such as Xian in the northwest have posted videos of hospitals crowded with parents and children awaiting checks.翻译:最近几天，西北西安等城市的媒体发布了医院挤满家长和孩子等待检查的视频。

Some social media users have posted photos of children doing homework while receiving intravenous drips in hospital.翻译:一些社交媒体用户发布了孩子们在医院接受静脉滴注时做作业的照片。

The WHO said that while it was seeking additional information, it recommended that people in China follow measures to reduce the risk of respiratory illness.翻译:世界卫生组织表示，在寻求更多信息的同时，建议中国民众采取措施降低呼吸道疾病的风险。

Measures included vaccination, keeping distance from sick people, staying at home when ill, getting tested and medical care as needed, wearing masks as appropriate, ensuring good ventilation, and regular hand-washing, it said.翻译:报告称，措施包括接种疫苗、与病人保持距离、生病时待在家里、根据需要接受检测和医疗护理、适当佩戴口罩、确保良好的通风和定期洗手。

Reporting By Deena Beasley in Los Angeles, Andrew Silver in Shanghai, Jennifer Rigby in London and Emma Farge in Geneva, Urvi Dugar in Bengaluru; Editing by Robert Birsel, Miyoung Kim and Josie Kao翻译:洛杉矶的 Deena Beasley、上海的 Andrew Silver、伦敦的 Jennifer Rigby 和日内瓦的 Emma Farge、班加罗尔的 Urvi Dugar 报道；编辑：Robert Birsel、Miyoung Kim 和 Josie Kao

item.title: 乌拉圭和中国同意寻求双边贸易协定以及南方共同市场协议
item.description:
Summary:
  • Uruguay wants trade deal between Mercosur, China
  • Mercosur-China deal could pressure Paraguay over Taiwan ties
  • Uruguayan beef exports to China face higher tariffs than Australia
翻译:概括：
  • 乌拉圭希望南方共同市场与中国达成贸易协议
  • 南方共同市场与中国的协议可能会在台湾关系问题上给巴拉圭带来压力
  • 乌拉圭牛肉出口中国面临比澳大利亚更高的关税

Uruguayan President Luis Lacalle Pou and Chinese Premier Li Qiang are keen to keep working on a bilateral free trade agreement as well as pursue one between China and the wider Mercosur trade bloc, according to a joint statement.翻译:根据一份联合声明，乌拉圭总统路易斯·拉卡列·波乌和中国总理李强热衷于继续致力于双边自由贸易协定的制定，并寻求中国与更广泛的南方共同市场贸易集团之间的自由贸易协定。

The statement follows a Thursday meeting in Beijing between the two and comes after China and Uruguay this week upgraded their bilateral relationship to a "comprehensive strategic partnership," elevating Montevideo's ties with Beijing to those of Argentina and Brazil.翻译:该声明是在两国周四在北京举行会议之后发表的，此前中国和乌拉圭本周将双边关系升级为“全面战略伙伴关系”，将蒙得维的亚与北京的关系提升至阿根廷和巴西的关系。

Beijing is seen as particularly interested in an FTA with Mercosur as that could put pressure on Paraguay, the last remaining South American country with ties to Taipei, to rethink its links with Taiwan which China considers part of its territory.翻译:北京被认为对与南方共同市场达成自由贸易协定特别感兴趣，因为这可能会给巴拉圭带来压力，巴拉圭是最后一个与台北有联系的南美国家，要求其重新考虑与台湾的关系，中国认为台湾是其领土的一部分。

The statement said that Uruaguay and China were committed to pursuing a bilateral FTA and noted that a joint feasibility study had been completed.翻译:声明称，乌拉圭和中国致力于建立双边自由贸易协定，并指出联合可行性研究已经完成。

"At the same time, the two sides are willing to promote China-Mercosur FTA talks," it added.翻译:同时，双方愿推动中国-南方共同市场自贸区谈判。”

Lacalle Pou first proposed a bilateral FTA with China in 2021 to secure similar opportunities for its exporters as those enjoyed by Chile, Costa Rica, Ecuador and Peru - countries which have secured tariff-free access to the world's second-largest economy.翻译:Lacalle Pou首次提议于2021年与中国签署双边自由贸易协定，以确保其出口商享有与智利、哥斯达黎加、厄瓜多尔和秘鲁类似的机会，这些国家已获得世界第二大经济体的免关税准入。

"Uruguay is firmly committed to close relations with China and active participation in the Belt and Road Initiative (BRI)," Lacalle Pou said, according to a readout of the meeting in Chinese state media.翻译:据中国官方媒体报道，拉卡勒·鲍表示：“乌拉圭坚定致力于与中国保持密切关系，并积极参与‘一带一路’倡议。”

Uruguay was also "willing to... accelerate establishing an FTA between Uruguay, Mercosur and China," Chinese media quoted him as saying.翻译:中国媒体援引他的话说，乌拉圭也“愿意……加速乌拉圭、南方共同市场和中国之间建立自由贸易协定”。

But Uruguay faces stiff opposition from fellow Mercosur members Argentina, Brazil and Paraguay who want their bloc to settle an FTA with Europe instead.翻译:但乌拉圭面临南方共同市场其他成员国阿根廷、巴西和巴拉圭的强烈反对，他们希望自己的集团与欧洲达成自由贸易协定。

Last November, they warned they could take "measures" against Uruguay if it forged ahead with its plans to unilaterally negotiate an FTA with China.翻译:去年11月，他们警告说，如果乌拉圭继续推进与中国单方面谈判自由贸易协定的计划，他们可能会对乌拉圭采取“措施”。

Uruguay has also applied to join a major trans-Pacific free trade pact that China also aspires to join, but both Montevideo and Beijing must overcome significant political hurdles before that is possible.翻译:乌拉圭还申请加入一项重要的跨太平洋自由贸易协定，中国也渴望加入，但蒙得维的亚和北京都必须克服重大政治障碍才能实现这一目标。

Li was quoted as saying that China and Uruguay should take the signing of Belt and Road Initiative cooperation documents as an opportunity to promote a continuing increase in bilateral trade.翻译:李克强表示，中乌应以签署“一带一路”合作文件为契机，推动双边贸易持续增长。

China accounted for 27% of Uruguay's exports in 2022, United Nations Comtrade data shows.翻译:联合国商品贸易统计数据显示，2022年中国占乌拉圭出口的27%。

At present, Uruguayan beef, which constituted two-thirds of those exports to China, is subject to a 12% tariff.翻译:目前，占对华出口量三分之二的乌拉圭牛肉需缴纳12%的关税。

By comparison, other major beef exporters Australia and New Zealand, which have FTAs with China, pay tariffs at 3.3% and 0%.翻译:相比之下，与中国签订自由贸易协定的其他主要牛肉出口国澳大利亚和新西兰的关税分别为3.3%和0%。

Uruguay came close to signing an FTA with the United States in 2006, but its government at the time eventually rejected the deal over fears of expulsion from Mercosur if it did so.翻译:2006年，乌拉圭差点与美国签署自由贸易协定，但当时的政府最终拒绝了该协议，因为担心这样做会被逐出南方共同市场。

According to a study conducted by the National Meat Institute of Uruguay in 2021, if China signs an FTA with Uruguay, the meat industry can implement a 0% preferential tariff, which will reduce tariffs by $150 million.翻译:乌拉圭国家肉类研究所2021年的一项研究显示，如果中国与乌拉圭签署自由贸易协定，肉类行业可以实施0%的优惠关税，这将减少1.5亿美元的关税。

item.title: 亚洲股市受中国拖累，国债收益率攀升
item.description:
Asian shares were dragged lower by losses in China on Friday and in the absence of guidance from Wall Street, which was closed for the Thanksgiving holiday, while the dollar stayed on the back foot and Treasury yields climbed a touch.翻译:亚洲股市周五因中国股市下跌以及华尔街因感恩节假期休市而缺乏指引而走低，而美元则处于弱势，美国国债收益率小幅攀升。

The holiday lull is likely to extend to Europe, with EUROSTOXX 50 futures mostly flat. Both S&P 500 futures and Nasdaq futures were also little changed.翻译:假期平静期可能会延续至欧洲，EUROSTX 50 期货基本持平。标准普尔 500 指数期货和纳斯达克期货也几乎没有变化。

In geopolitical news, Israel and Hamas started a four-day ceasefire on Friday. The militants are set to release 13 Israeli women and child hostages later in the day and aid will flow into the besieged Gaza enclave, the first pause in the near seven-week-old war.翻译:地缘政治新闻方面， 以色列和哈马斯周五开始为期四天的停火。武装分子将于当天晚些时候释放 13 名以色列妇女和儿童人质，援助物资将流入被围困的加沙飞地，这是这场近七周战争的第一次停顿。

MSCI's broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan (.MIAPJ0000PUS) fell 0.6% but are still headed for a weekly gain of 0.8%. It is up about 7% in November as investors grew increasingly confident that U.S. rates have peaked, with discussion shifting to the timing and speed of rate cuts.翻译:MSCI 日本以外最广泛的亚太股市指数(.MIAPJ0000PUS)下跌 0.6%，但仍有望实现周涨幅 0.8%。由于投资者对美国利率已见顶越来越有信心，讨论转向降息的时机和速度，11 月份该指数上涨了约 7%。

Japan's markets (.N225) returned from a holiday, with the Nikkei (.225) climbing 0.7% to charge towards a 33-year high hit on Monday.翻译:日本市场(.N225)从假期中恢复，日经指数(.225)上涨 0.7%，冲向周一触及的 33 年来的高点。

Data on Friday showed that Japan's core consumer inflation picked up slightly in October, although by less than expected, and factory activity shrank for a sixth month.翻译:周五的数据显示，日本十月份核心消费者通胀率小幅回升，但增幅低于预期， 工厂活动连续第六个月萎缩。

Chinese bluechips (.CSI300) fell 0.7% while Hong Kong's Hang Seng index (.HSI) tumbled 1.4%, reversing the previous day's hefty gains. Chinese developers listed in Hong Kong (.HSMPI) lost 2%, after jumping 6.4% on Thursday on more support measures from Beijing to prop up their beleaguered industry.翻译:中国蓝筹股(.CSI300)下跌 0.7%，香港恒生指数(.HSI)下跌 1.4%，扭转了前一交易日的大幅涨幅。在香港上市的中国开发商(.HSMPI)周四下跌 6.4%，下跌 2%，原因是北京采取了更多支持措施来支撑陷入困境的行业。

"Since share markets rebounded so quickly, they became technically overbought, so it's quite possible we go through a period of consolidation," said Shane Oliver, chief economist at AMP.翻译:AMP 首席经济学家肖恩·奥利弗 (Shane Oliver) 表示：“由于股市反弹如此之快，技术上已经超买，因此我们很可能会经历一段整合期。”

"You get the talk of the so-called Santa rally, but often times Santa rally doesn't really occur in the last two weeks of December. So we could have a couple of weeks with the markets sort of just meandering around and lacking direction."翻译:“人们谈论所谓的圣诞老人集会，但通常圣诞老人集会并不会真正发生在 12 月的最后两周。因此，我们可能会经历几周市场徘徊且缺乏方向的情况。” ”。

Overnight, U.S. markets were closed for the holiday. In Europe, slightly better than expected euro zone PMIs nudged the euro and shares higher and Sweden's crown dropped as its central bank left rates on hold.翻译:隔夜，美国市场因假期休市。在欧洲，欧元区采购经理人指数略好于预期，推动欧元和股市走高，瑞典克朗因央行维持利率不变而下跌。

Minutes of the European Central Bank October policy meeting showed euro zone inflation was falling as expected, or even a bit faster, but suggested policymakers needed to keep the possibility of an interest rate hike on the table.翻译:欧洲央行10月政策会议纪要显示，欧元区通胀正按预期下降，甚至更快，但暗示政策制定者需要保留加息的可能性。

Cash Treasuries fell a little as they resumed trading in Asia, with two-year Treasury yields up 3 basis points to 4.9419% and benchmark ten-year yields up 4 bps to 4.4606%.翻译:亚洲恢复交易后，现金国债小幅下跌，两年期国债收益率上涨3个基点至4.9419%，基准十年期国债收益率上涨4个基点至4.4606%。

In the currency markets, moves were mostly muted. The dollar index < =USD>, which measures the U.S. currency with six peers, was on the back foot at 103.71, nearing a three month low of 103.17.翻译:在货币市场，走势大多温和。衡量美元与六种货币的美元指数处于不利地位，为103.71，接近三个月低点103.17。

The sterling perched near a 2-1/2 month top at $1.2540, as strong results from a business survey led markets to push back bets on when the first Bank of England rate cut might come.翻译:英镑汇率接近2-1/2个月高点1.2540美元，因商业调查的强劲结果导致市场推迟对英格兰银行何时首次降息的押注。

Oil prices extended losses after tumbling more than 1% on concerns over the delayed OPEC+ meeting. Brent crude futures fell 0.2% to $81.26 a barrel.翻译:由于对 OPEC+ 会议推迟的担忧，油价暴跌逾 1% 后扩大跌幅。布伦特原油期货下跌 0.2%，至每桶 81.26 美元。

Gold prices was 0.1% higher at $1,993.63 per ounce.翻译:金价上涨 0.1%，至每盎司 1,993.63 美元。

Reporting by Stella Qiu. Editing by Sam Holmes, Robert Birsel翻译:邱斯特拉报道。山姆·霍姆斯、罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑

item.title: 中缅关系出现紧张迹象后，中国特使举行高层会谈
item.description:
China's ambassador to Myanmar has met top officials there for talks on stability on their common border, Myanmar media reported on Friday, after recent signs that their relationship has been coming under rare strain.翻译:缅甸媒体周五报道，中国驻缅甸大使已会见了当地高级官员，就共同边界的稳定问题进行了会谈，此前有迹象表明，两国关系正面临罕见的紧张。

Northeastern Myanmar regions on the border with China have been rocked for the past month by an ethnic minority insurgent offensive against forces of Myanmar's military rulers.翻译:过去一个月，缅甸东北部与中国接壤的地区因少数民族叛乱分子对缅甸军事统治者军队的进攻而受到震动。

At the same time, Chinese and Myanmar junta officials have launched a crackdown in the region on gangs operating internet fraud centres that China blames for cheating many of its people. As part of that drive, Myanmar handed over tens of thousands Chinese telecom fraud suspects this month.翻译:与此同时，中国和缅甸军政府官员在该地区发起了打击经营网络诈骗中心的团伙的行动，中国指责这些团伙欺骗了许多人民。作为这一行动的一部分，缅甸本月移交了数万名中国电信诈骗嫌疑人。

Both Myanmar state media and China's embassy reported that Chinese ambassador Chen Hai met Myanmar's military-appointed foreign minister, Than Swe, and military officials in the capital Naypyitaw on Thursday.翻译:缅甸官方媒体和中国大使馆均报道称，中国大使陈海周四在首都内比都会见了缅甸军方任命的外交部长丹瑞和军方官员。

They discussed "bilateral relations, continued implementation of mutually beneficial bilateral projects" and "cooperation in peace and stability and rule of law along the border areas", the state-run Global New Light of Myanmar newspaper reported. The Chinese embassy gave no details.翻译:据国营缅甸《全球新光》报道，他们讨论了“双边关系、继续实施互利的双边项目”以及“边境地区和平稳定和法治合作”。中国大使馆没有透露细节。

The insurgent offensive on the Myanmar side of the border and the drive against the online fraud gangs, many organised by Chinese criminals, has shone a spotlight on relations between Beijing and the Myanmar junta.翻译:边境缅甸一侧的叛乱分子攻势以及对网络诈骗团伙（其中许多团伙由中国犯罪分子组织）的打击，让北京与缅甸军政府之间的关系成为人们关注的焦点。

China has been supportive of the Myanmar military since it overthrew an elected government in a 2021 coup but Chinese authorities have for years had complex cross-border relations with factions in northeast Myanmar often outside the control of the central government.翻译:自从缅甸在 2021 年政变中推翻民选政府以来，中国一直支持缅甸军方，但多年来，中国当局与缅甸东北部的派系之间一直存在复杂的跨境关系，而这些派系往往不受中央政府的控制。

Myanmar authorities have long suspected China of meddling in support of some militia factions.翻译:缅甸当局长期以来一直怀疑中国干预支持一些民兵派别。

On the weekend, in a rare rally in Myanmar since a sweeping crackdown on dissent, dozens of nationalist protesters gathered outside the Chinese embassy in the main city of Yangon with banners and posters critical of Beijing.翻译:周末，数十名民族主义抗议者聚集在主要城市仰光的中国大使馆外，举着批评北京的横幅和海报，这是缅甸自全面镇压异见以来罕见的集会。

"We request China government don't support northern terrorist groups," read one of their posters, in English.翻译:他们的一张英文海报上写道：“我们要求中国政府不要支持北方恐怖组织。”

Authorities took no discernable action to clear the protesters, media reported.翻译:据媒体报道，当局没有采取任何明显行动来驱散抗议者。

Junta spokesman Zaw Min Tun later said the protesters were opposed to the insurgents. He did not refer to their call for China not to support the rebels but accused the Western media of trying to destroy Myanmar's relations with China.翻译:军政府发言人佐敏吞后来表示，抗议者反对叛乱分子。他没有提及他们呼吁中国不要支持叛乱分子，而是指责西方媒体试图破坏缅甸与中国的关系。

China has called for peace and stability in Myanmar.翻译:中方呼吁缅甸和平稳定。

Reporting by Albee Zhang, Ryan Woo in Beijing, and Reuters staff; Editing by Edmund Klamann, Robert Birsel翻译:Albee 张、Ryan Woo 北京以及路透社工作人员的报道；编辑：埃德蒙·克拉曼、罗伯特·伯塞尔

item.title: 随着市场权衡美国利率前景，美元波动
item.description:
The dollar was restrained on Friday by uncertainty over the path of U.S. interest rates, while the yen strengthened after Japan's core consumer price growth picked up, reinforcing views that the Bank of Japan may soon roll back monetary stimulus.翻译:美元周五因美国利率走势的不确定性而受到抑制，而日元在日本核心消费者物价增速回升后走强，强化了日本央行可能很快收回货币刺激措施的观点。

With U.S. markets closed on Thursday for the Thanksgiving holdiay and due for a shorter trading session on Friday, currencies are likely to trade narrowly but possibly with some volatility as liquidity is expected to remain thin.翻译:由于美国市场周四因感恩节假期而休市，周五交易时段较短，因此货币交易可能会窄幅波动，但可能会出现一些波动，因为预计流动性仍然较低。

The dollar index , which measures the U.S. currency with six peers, eased 0.058% to 103.71, staying close to the two-and-a-half month low of 103.17 it touched earlier this week.翻译:衡量美元与六种货币的美元指数下跌0.058%至103.71，接近本周早些时候触及的两个半月低点103.17。

The index is down 2.8% for the month, on course for its weakest monthly performance in a year on growing expectations that the Federal Reserve is done raising interest rates and could start cutting rates next year.翻译:该指数本月下跌 2.8%，有望创下一年来最弱的月度表现，原因是人们越来越预期美联储将结束加息，并可能在明年开始降息。

Markets have dialled back expectations of Fed rate cuts in 2024, with futures now showing a 26% chance that the Fed cuts its target rate at the March 2024 policy meeting, according to CME Group's FedWatch tool. That compares with a 33% chance last week.翻译:市场已经调低了对美联储 2024 年降息的预期，根据芝商所的 FedWatch 工具，期货目前显示美联储在 2024 年 3 月政策会议上下调目标利率的可能性为 26%。相比之下，上周的可能性为 33%。

Meanwhile, Japan's core consumer price growth picked up slightly in October, after easing the previous month, reinforcing investors' views that stubborn inflation may push the BOJ to roll back monetary stimulus before long.翻译:与此同时，日本核心消费者价格增速继上个月放缓后，10 月份小幅回升，强化了投资者的观点，即顽固的通胀可能会促使日本央行在不久之后收回货币刺激措施。

ING economists said they expect the BOJ to move away from its super-accommodative stance next year.翻译:ING经济学家表示，他们预计日本央行明年将放弃超级宽松立场。

"We believe that the BOJ may scrap the yield curve programme as early as the first quarter of next, as Japanese government bonds appear to have stabilised ... then begin its first rate hike in Q2 2024 if wage growth continues to accelerate next year."翻译:“我们认为，日本央行可能最早在明年第一季度取消收益率曲线计划，因为日本政府债券似乎已经企稳……如果明年工资增长继续加速，那么日本央行可能会在 2024 年第二季度开始首次加息。 ”

The nationwide core consumer price index (CPI), which excludes volatile fresh food costs, rose 2.9% year-on-year in October, government data showed on Friday, against 3.0% expected by economists in a Reuters poll.翻译:政府周五公布的数据显示，10月份全国核心消费者价格指数（CPI）（不包括波动较大的生鲜食品成本）同比上涨2.9%，而路透调查中经济学家的预期为3.0%。

The Japanese yen strengthened 0.21% to 149.23 per dollar. The Asian currency has slowly crawled away from the near 33-year low of 151.92 it touched at the start of last week and is up 1.5% for the month.翻译:日元兑美元汇率上涨 0.21%，至 149.23 美元。亚洲货币已从上周初触及的近 33 年低点 151.92 缓慢回升，本月上涨 1.5%。

Japan's factory activity shrank for a sixth straight month in November, while modest growth in the service sector was little changed, a business survey showed on Friday, highlighting the fragility of the economy amid soft demand and inflation.翻译:周五的一项商业调查显示，日本11月份工厂活动连续第六个月萎缩，而服务业的温和增长几乎没有变化，凸显了需求疲软和通胀背景下经济的脆弱性。

The euro stood at $1.09065, having risen 0.16% overnight after a series of preliminary surveys showed recession in Germany may be shallower than expected, which offset a downbeat reading on French business activity.翻译:一系列初步调查显示德国经济衰退可能比预期浅，抵消了法国商业活动的悲观预期，欧元兑美元汇率隔夜上涨0.16%，报1.09065美元。

Sterling was last at $1.254, up 0.06% on the day.翻译:英镑最新报1.254美元，当日上涨0.06%。

The Australian dollar rose 0.11% to $0.656, while the kiwi rose 0.15% to $0.606.翻译:澳元兑美元上涨0.11%至0.656美元，新西​​兰元上涨0.15%至0.606美元。

Cash Treasuries resumed trading in Asia after Japan's holiday on Thursday, with the yield on 10-year Treasury notes up 4.3 basis points (bps) to 4.459%.翻译:周四日本假期后，现金国债在亚洲恢复交易，10 年期国债收益率上涨 4.3 个基点 (bps) 至 4.459%。

The yield on the 30-year Treasury bond rose 3.6 bps to 4.584%.

item.title: 中国法院驳回加拿大流行歌星吴亦凡的上诉
item.description:
A court in China's capital Beijing on Friday denied the appeal of Canadian pop star Kris Wu, who was sentenced to 13 years in prison for crimes including rape, it said in a statement.翻译:中国首都北京一家法院在一份声明中称，周五驳回了加拿大流行歌星吴亦凡的上诉，吴亦凡因强奸等罪名被判处 13 年有期徒刑。

Chinese-born Wu, 33, was a former member of K-pop group EXO and returned to China in 2014, where he built a lucrative career.翻译:33 岁的吴出生于中国，曾是韩国流行音乐组合 EXO 的成员，并于 2014 年返回中国，并在那里建立了一份利润丰厚的职业生涯。

"(Kris) Wu violated the will of women and took advantage of the drunkenness of multiple victims to have sexual relations with them. His behaviour constituted the crime of rape," the Beijing No.3 Intermediate People's Court said.翻译:北京市第三中级人民法院称：“吴某违反妇女意愿，利用多名受害人醉酒时与其发生性关系，其行为已构成强奸罪。”

Wu was detained in July 2021 after an 18-year-old Chinese student publicly accused him of inducing her and other girls, some of them younger than 18, to have sex with him.翻译:2021 年 7 月，一名 18 岁中国学生公开指控吴引诱她和其他女孩（其中一些年龄不到 18 岁）与他发生性关系，随后吴被拘留。

The court said Wu gathered a crowd to engage in lewd activities and was the ringleader, therefore his behaviour constituted the crime of group licentiousness, and it would maintain the original ruling.翻译:法院认为，吴某聚众实施猥亵活动，是首要分子，其行为已构成聚众淫乱罪，维持原判。

Wu's close relatives and officials from the Canadian embassy in China attended the verdict announcement.翻译:吴某的近亲属和加拿大驻华使馆官员旁听了宣判。

Wu, who could not be contacted, has previously denied the accusation. Reuters did not have access to his relatives or his legal representatives for comment, while the Canadian embassy did not respond immediately to a request for comment.翻译:无法联系到吴先生，他此前否认了这一指控。路透社未能联系到他的亲属或法律代表置评，而加拿大大使馆也没有立即回应置评请求。

Consular officials have been actively engaged on Wu's case. The Canadian government said in July that its diplomats were denied access to the start of Wu's appeal trial. Beijing said it notified the embassy of the appeal trial in advance, but it was not open to the public to protect the privacy of the victims.翻译:领事官员一直在积极处理吴的案件。加拿大政府七月表示，其外交官被拒绝旁听吴上诉审判的开始。北京表示，已提前将上诉审理情况通知使馆，但为保护受害者隐私，不向公众公开。

In addition to his pop career, Wu in 2017 made his Hollywood debut in the film "XXX: Return of Xander Cage".翻译:除了流行事业之外，吴于2017年在电影《XXX：桑德·凯奇归来》中首次亮相好莱坞。

At the time of his detention, Wu was an ambassador for 15 brands, such as Bulgari, Lancome, Louis Vuitton and Porsche, all of which immediately severed ties with him.翻译:吴宇森被捕时是宝格丽、兰蔻、路易威登、保时捷等15个品牌的形象大使，这些品牌立即与他断绝了关系。

item.title: 台湾反对党在统一谈判破裂后提名副总统候选人
item.description:
Taiwan's two main opposition parties on Friday named their vice presidential candidates after talks about running a joint ticket to take on the ruling party failed.翻译:台湾两个主要反对党在联合竞选对抗执政党的谈判失败后，于周五任命了副总统候选人。

The largest opposition party the Kuomintang chose media personality Jaw Shaw-kong, while the much smaller Taiwan People's Party selected one of its lawmakers, Cynthia Wu.翻译:最大的反对党国民党选择了媒体人物萧绍刚，而规模小得多的台湾人民党则选择了其议员之一吴辛西娅。

item.title: 追逐不一样的中国梦，年轻的数字游民走向山野
item.description:
In this mountain town in China's southwest, drifters and tarot card readers rub shoulders with tech entrepreneurs and artists. Many are former city-dwellers in search of an elusive prize in authoritarian China: Space for open discussion and exchange of ideas.翻译:在中国西南部的这座山城里，漂泊者和塔罗牌占卜师与科技企业家和艺术家擦肩而过。许多人都是前城市居民，在专制中国寻找难以捉摸的奖品：公开讨论和交流思想的空间。

In one co-working space, a group of young adults asked questions about the effect of Trump-era populism on U.S. media during a discussion led by a Chinese journalist about the American position on the Israel-Gaza conflict. In a nearby cafe, others discussed art, sexual harassment and the listlessness of China's youth.翻译:在一个联合办公空间里，一群年轻人在一名中国记者主持的讨论中询问了特朗普时代民粹主义对美国媒体的影响，讨论了美国对以色列-加沙冲突的立场。在附近的一家咖啡馆里，其他人讨论了艺术、性骚扰和中国年轻人的无精打采。

As President Xi Jinping tightens his grip on the restricted personal freedoms of Chinese citizens and the economy stutters, exacerbating a youth unemployment crisis, Dali in Yunnan province has become a haven for those seeking to escape the pressure.翻译:随着习近平主席加强对中国公民个人自由的限制，经济陷入停滞，加剧了青年失业危机，云南省大理已成为那些寻求逃避压力的人的避风港。

They are drawn by the cheap rents, mild climate, stunning scenery and a history of relative tolerance, which were popularised by a television drama this year about a digital nomad.翻译:他们被廉价的租金、温和的气候、迷人的风景和相对宽容的历史所吸引，这些都因今年一部关于数字游牧民族的电视剧而流行。

Dali's Old Town district, administratively part of a city of 650,000, has attracted culture workers since the late 1990s, said Minhua Ling, an expert on Chinese migration at the Geneva Graduate Institute, adding that the normalisation of remote work and Dali's less restrictive policies during China's zero-COVID crackdown also increased its appeal.翻译:日内瓦研究生院中国移民问题专家凌敏华表示，大理老城区是这座拥有 65 万人口的城市的行政一部分，自 20 世纪 90 年代末以来一直吸引着文化工作者。中国的零新冠打击也增加了其吸引力。

In November, searches for "Dali" on WeChat were up 7% from a year ago, having surged some 290% on one day in late July, when many Chinese were booking summer trips.翻译:11 月份，微信上“大理”的搜索量比一年前增长了 7%，7 月底的一天飙升了约 290%，当时许多中国人都在预订夏季旅行。

Reuters interviewed 13 Chinese migrants to Dali, who described a refuge on the fringes of mainstream society, but also one that implicitly challenges Xi's "China Dream" of a prosperous nation ideologically loyal to the Communist Party. Many of them spoke on condition of anonymity for fear of government retaliation.翻译:路透社采访了13名前往大理的中国移民，他们描述了这是一个位于主流社会边缘的避难所，但也暗中挑战了习近平的“中国梦”，即一个在意识形态上忠于共产党的繁荣国家。由于担心政府报复，他们中的许多人都要求匿名。

"When younger generations are materially sufficient but spiritually lost, of course they will seek personal growth and freedom," said Bai Yunxi, a Dali-based 33-year-old civil servant-turned-astrologer.翻译:“当年轻一代物质充足但精神失落时，他们当然会寻求个人成长和自由，”大理33岁的公务员出身的占星师白云熙说。

Six of the people expressed concern about increased police scrutiny of their activities, citing abrupt cancellations of large-scale events and police raids.翻译:其中六人对警方加强对其活动的审查表示担忧，理由是大型活动突然取消和警方突击搜查。

Dali city's propaganda bureau did not respond to a faxed request for comment on the crackdowns and Dali's efforts to attract young skilled workers.

'IDEAL KINGDOM'

With youth unemployment at a record high this summer - when China stopped releasing the statistic - and a stagnant rural population due to low fertility rates and urban migration, Beijing has tried to enlist young people in "rural revitalisation".翻译:今年夏天，青年失业率创历史新高（当时中国停止发布统计数据），而农村人口由于低生育率和城市人口迁移而停滞不前，北京试图让年轻人参与“乡村振兴”。

Xi has urged graduates to "return to their hometowns" and "actively seek hardships", alluding to his experience during the Cultural Revolution. But the message does not appear to resonate with urban youths who grew up with expectations of prosperity but now find social mobility hard to attain.翻译:习近平引用了他在文革期间的经历，敦促毕业生“回到家乡”并“积极吃苦”。但这一信息似乎并没有引起城市年轻人的共鸣，他们在繁荣的期望中长大，但现在发现社会流动性很难实现。

Dali, where several of the people interviewed by Reuters said they found an escape from the conservative social values of rural China, is an exception to the flight of youth to large cities that has occurred since China's economic modernisation.翻译:路透社采访的几位人士表示，大理是中国经济现代化以来年轻人涌向大城市的一个例外，他们在那里找到了逃离中国农村保守社会价值观的地方。

Bai moved to Dali in September, quitting her government job to give online astrology readings. She shares a three-storey house with her partner, a friend and three cats. "My living situation provides enough space to develop my career and personal life without interference from others," she said.翻译:白九月辞去政府工作搬到大理，开始进行在线占星术解读。她与伴侣、一位朋友和三只猫合住一栋三层楼的房子。 “我的生活状况为我发展事业和个人生活提供了足够的空间，不受他人干扰，”她说。

She also referenced Dali's nickname, "Ideal Kingdom" - a pun on its Chinese characters that also reflects its 10th-century status as an independent state - as part of its appeal.翻译:她还提到了大理的绰号“理想王国”——这是一个汉字的双关语，也反映了大理在 10 世纪作为一个独立国家的地位——作为其吸引力的一部分。

Recruitment startup founder Chen Zhengyun, 37, said living in Dali freed him from societal pressure to get married early, as state calls for matrimony grow louder amid China's demographic crisis.翻译:37岁的招聘初创公司创始人陈正云表示，在中国人口危机期间，国家要求结婚的呼声越来越高，住在大理让他摆脱了早婚的社会压力。

"There are some personal topics that you can't bring up elsewhere that you can talk about here," said Chen, adding that the concentration of like-minded young people, social events and tolerance for diverse lifestyles allowed him to explore open relationships.

POLICE OVERSIGHT

The local government has sought to attract young tech talent and in September asked digital nomads for input on policies, two community organisers told Reuters.翻译:两名社区组织者告诉路透社，当地政府一直在寻求吸引年轻科技人才，并于 9 月向数字游牧民征求政策意见。

But the town's population also includes many young people who say they are sceptical of Beijing's attempts to shape their personal lives.翻译:但该镇的居民中也有许多年轻人表示，他们对北京试图塑造他们个人生活的做法持怀疑态度。

A large digital nomad conference with art and tech-related seminars was abruptly cancelled on Nov. 2, a week before its scheduled start, due to "deep consideration of various factors", the organiser, co-working space NCC, wrote on social media.翻译:主办方联合办公空间 NCC 在社交媒体上写道，由于“对各种因素的深入考虑”，一场包含艺术和科技相关研讨会的大型数字游牧者会议于 11 月 2 日突然取消，距离原定开始时间还有一周。 。

NCC declined to elaborate publicly, citing sensitivities.翻译:NCC 以敏感性为由，拒绝公开详细说明。

During a recent visit, Reuters saw a police surveillance camera trained on NCC's main communal area.翻译:在最近的一次访问中，路透社看到警察监控摄像头对准了 NCC 的主要公共区域。

Three people familiar with event organisers in Dali said the November forum - like another conference on decentralised internet technologies planned last year - was cancelled after the government abruptly withdrew funding and support.翻译:三名熟悉大理活动组织者的人士表示，11 月的论坛——就像去年计划的另一场去中心化互联网技术会议一样——在政府突然撤回资金和支持后被取消。

Many digital nomads who use co-working spaces are involved with technologies like blockchain, according to organisers, which they say has drawn scrutiny from local authorities.翻译:组织者称，许多使用联合办公空间的数字游牧者都参与了区块链等技术，他们说这些技术已经引起了地方当局的审查。

Two other co-working spaces were shut down unexpectedly for months, with one also visited by local police earlier this year, according to three people familiar with the matter.翻译:据三名知情人士透露，另外两个联合办公空间意外关闭了几个月，其中一个空间今年早些时候也被当地警方探访过。

China banned cryptocurrency mining and trading in 2021, part of a broader crackdown on the tech sector.翻译:中国于 2021 年禁止加密货币开采和交易，这是对科技行业更广泛打击的一部分。

"We are more low-key and don't emphasise digital nomads in our marketing anymore," one co-working space staffer told Reuters, adding that conservative local governments in rural towns like Dali are "cautious of emerging technologies".翻译:“我们更加低调，不再在营销中强调数字游牧民，”一位联合办公空间工作人员告诉路透社，并补充说大理等农村城镇的保守地方政府“对新兴技术持谨慎态度”。

Such state monitoring efforts do not surprise Ling, the academic. Since digital nomads, unlike university students, "are not subject to structured discipline, they are harder to manage", she said.翻译:这种国家监控的努力并不令学者令感到惊讶。她说，由于数字游牧民与大学生不同，“不受结构化纪律的约束，因此更难管理”。

Reporting by Laurie Chen; Editing by Katerina Ang翻译:陈劳瑞报道；卡特琳娜·昂 编辑
item.author: Laurie Chen

item.title: 美国海军对与中国加强沟通的前景感到“兴奋”，但表示还需要做更多工作
item.description:
The U.S. Navy was "excited" by the prospect of improved operational communications with the Chinese military amid roiling regional tensions, but work was still needed to solidify the next steps, a senior U.S. naval officer said on Friday.翻译:一名美国海军高级军官周五表示，在地区紧张局势不断加剧的情况下，美国海军对与中国军方改善作战沟通的前景感到“兴奋”，但仍需要努力巩固下一步措施。

Admiral Lisa Franchetti, U.S. Chief of Naval Operations, told a media briefing during a visit to Busan that it was vital to maintain open lines of communications between the two militaries to avoid "misunderstandings and miscalculations" that could lead to conflict.翻译:美国海军作战部长丽莎·弗朗凯蒂上将在访问釜山期间在媒体吹风会上表示，保持两军之间开放的沟通渠道至关重要，以避免可能导致冲突的“误解和误判”。

"I'm very excited and I welcome that announcement," she said of China's agreement to resume telephone communications between theatre commands, something U.S. officials have been eager to develop.翻译:“我非常兴奋，我欢迎这一消息，”她在谈到中国​​同意恢复战区司令部之间的电话通信时说道，这是美国官员一直渴望发展的。

"These agreements were reached just recently, and we know that we have work with the PRC military to do to solidify the next steps," Franchetti said.翻译:弗朗凯蒂说：“这些协议是最近才达成的，我们知道我们正在与中华人民共和国军方合作，以巩固下一步的行动。”

Franchetti is making her first trip to the region since she was confirmed by the U.S. Senate on Nov. 2 as the first woman to command the Navy and be a member of the Joint Chiefs of Staff.翻译:这是弗朗凯蒂自 11 月 2 日被美国参议院确认为首位女性海军司令和参谋长联席会议成员以来首次访问该地区。

Her remarks come after agreements this month by U.S. President Joe Biden and China's Xi Jinping to resume military contacts that Beijing froze after then-House of Representatives Speaker Nancy Pelosi visited Taiwan in August 2022.翻译:她发表此番言论之前，美国总统乔·拜登和中国国家主席习近平本月达成协议，恢复军事接触，而在时任众议院议长南希·佩洛西于 2022 年 8 月访问台湾后，北京方面冻结了军事接触。

The need for improved military communications was part of four hours of discussions when the two leaders meet in San Francisco last week, talks that covered tensions over Taiwan, Iran and co-operation over reducing the flow to the opioid fentanyl to the United States.翻译:上周两位领导人在旧金山会面时，进行了四个小时的讨论，其中包括改善军事沟通的必要性，会谈内容涵盖了台湾、伊朗问题上的紧张局势，以及减少流向美国的阿片类芬太尼方面的合作。

The U.S. and some regional militaries have complained about near misses and unsafe interactions with Chinese aircraft and ships in the disputed South China Sea and across East Asia, leading to fears that tensions could spiral into conflict.翻译:美国和一些地区军队抱怨称，在有争议的南海和整个东亚地区，与中国飞机和舰船的险些发生和不安全的互动，引发了人们对紧张局势可能升级为冲突的担忧。

"We expect all navies in international waters to uphold the rules and norms of proper military behaviour on, under and above the sea," she said.翻译:她说：“我们希望国际水域的所有海军都遵守海上、水下和海上适当军事行为的规则和规范。”

Asked repeatedly about Chinese military advances, particularly in its submarines and undersea surveillance operations, Franchetti said she was confident of U.S. naval dominance even as China "continues to develop its capabilities in the maritime domain and in all other domains".翻译:当被反复问及中国的军事进步，特别是潜艇和水下监视行动方面的进步时，弗朗凯蒂表示，尽管中国“继续发展其在海洋领域和所有其他领域的能力”，但她对美国海军的主导地位充满信心。

The U.S. would continue to operate closely with allies and partners "which is our strategic advantage and something China simply doesn't have."翻译:美国将继续与盟友和伙伴密切合作，“这是我们的战略优势，而中国根本不具备”。

Through tighter integration, planning and exercises with its network of allies and partners, she said the U.S. will "continue to deter China and other potential adversaries around the world".翻译:她表示，通过与其盟友和合作伙伴网络进行更紧密的整合、规划和演习，美国将“继续威慑中国和世界各地的其他潜在对手”。

Reporting by Greg Torode; Writing by Liz Lee; Editing by Jamie Freed and Gerry Doyle翻译:格雷格·托罗德报道；莉兹·李撰写；杰米·弗里德和格里·多伊尔编辑

item.title: 中韩日外长讨论三边峰会
item.description:
The foreign ministers of South Korea, China and Japan will meet for talks in South Korea on Sunday, South Korea's foreign ministry said on Friday, as the three countries seek to hold their first leaders' summit in four years.翻译:韩国外交部周五表示，韩国、中国和日本外长将于周日在韩国举行会谈，这三个国家寻求举行四年来的首次领导人峰会。

The neighbours had agreed to hold a summit every year starting in 2008 to foster regional cooperation, but the plan has been dogged by bilateral feuds and the COVID-19 pandemic. Their last summit was in 2019.翻译:邻国同意从 2008 年开始每年举行一次峰会，以促进区域合作，但该计划一直受到双边不和和新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 大流行的困扰。他们上次峰会是在 2019 年。

The meeting of foreign ministers, which will take place in the South Korean port city of Busan, is also the first such meeting since 2019. In September, senior diplomats from the three countries agreed to arrange a meeting of their leaders at the "earliest convenient time."翻译:将于韩国港口城市釜山举行的外长会议也是自 2019 年以来的首次此类会议。9 月，这三个国家的高级外交官同意安排领导人在“最早方便的时间”举行会晤。时间。”

"The foreign ministers plan to exchange views extensively on the direction of development of trilateral cooperation including preparations for a ninth trilateral summit, and regional and global issues," the South Korean foreign ministry said in a statement.翻译:韩国外交部在一份声明中表示，“外长们计划就三边合作的发展方向广泛交换意见，包括第九次三边峰会的筹备工作以及地区和全球问题。”

The ministers will also hold bilateral meetings on the sidelines, it added.翻译:声明补充说，部长们还将在场外举行双边会议。

The talks come as South Korea and Japan have seen improving ties and also deepening security cooperation with the United States amid concerns over China's growing regional influence.翻译:此次会谈正值韩国和日本改善关系并深化与美国的安全合作之际，两国对中国日益增长的地区影响力感到担忧。

Beijing has previously warned that U.S. efforts to strengthen ties with South Korea and Japan could increase tension and confrontation in the region.翻译:北京此前曾警告称，美国加强与韩国和日本关系的努力可能会加剧该地区的紧张局势和对抗。

The meeting in Busan also comes after North Korea said this week it had placed its first spy satellite in orbit, drawing international condemnation for violating U.N. resolutions that bar its use of technology applicable to ballistic missile programs.翻译:在釜山举行会议之前，朝鲜本周表示已将第一颗间谍卫星送入轨道，此举因违反禁止其使用适用于弹道导弹计划的技术的联合国决议而受到国际谴责。

Reporting by Ju-min Park and Hyonhee Shin; Editing by Ed Davies and Raju Gopalakrishnan翻译:Ju-min Park 和 Hyonhee Shin 的报道；编辑：Ed Davies 和 Raju Gopalakrishnan

item.title: 中国希望俄罗斯为中国汽车企业提供政策支持 - 中国官方媒体
item.description:
China hopes Russia will give policy support for Chinese automobile enterprises to produce, sell and operate in Russia, Chinese state media cited China's ambassador to Russia as saying on Friday.翻译:中国官方媒体周五援引中国驻俄罗斯大使的话说，中国希望俄罗斯为中国汽车企业在俄罗斯生产、销售和经营提供政策支持。

China will promote Chinese and Russian integration in the automotive industry supply chain, Ambassador Zhang Hanhui was cited as saying.翻译:张汉晖大使表示，中方将推动中俄汽车产业供应链一体化。

China is also willing to continue to give full play to the supply advantages of China's automobile industry and continue to develop models adapted to the needs of the Russian market, he said.翻译:中方也愿继续发挥中国汽车产业的供给优势，继续开发适应俄罗斯市场需求的车型。

Reporting by Liz Lee and Beijing newsroom; Editing by Christopher Cushing翻译:Liz Lee和北京新闻编辑室的报道；克里斯托弗·库欣编辑

item.title: 科学家警告中国肺炎报告不要按下“大流行恐慌按钮”
item.description:
Leading scientists urged caution over fears of another pandemic on Thursday after the World Health Organization requested more information from China on a rise of respiratory illnesses and pneumonia clusters among children.翻译:周四，在世界卫生组织要求中国提供更多有关儿童呼吸道疾病和肺炎聚集性病例增加的信息后，顶尖科学家敦促人们对再次发生大流行的担忧保持谨慎。

"We have to be careful," said Marion Koopmans, a Dutch virologist who advised the WHO on COVID-19. "We really need more information, particularly diagnostic information."翻译:“我们必须小心，”为世界卫生组织提供有关 COVID-19 问题建议的荷兰病毒学家 Marion Koopmans 说。 “我们确实需要更多信息，特别是诊断信息。”

Concerns were first sparked internationally by an alert published on Tuesday by the monitoring service ProMED, part of the International Society for Infectious Diseases. It called for more information about "undiagnosed pneumonia - China (Beijing, Liaoning)".翻译:国际传染病学会旗下监测服务机构 ProMED 周二发布的警报首先在国际上引发了担忧。它呼吁提供有关“未确诊肺炎-中国（北京、辽宁）”的更多信息。

The standard wording of the alert echoed the first-ever notice about what would become COVID-19, sent on Dec. 30 2019: "Undiagnosed pneumonia - China (Hubei)."翻译:该警报的标准措辞呼应了 2019 年 12 月 30 日发送的关于 COVID-19 的首个通知：“未确诊肺炎 - 中国（湖北）”。

Scientists said the similarity of the two alerts had stirred as yet unfounded worries the surge may be caused by another emerging pathogen that could spark a pandemic. They said based on the information so far, it was more likely to be a rise in other common respiratory infections like flu, as was seen in many parts of the world after COVID lockdowns were lifted. It could also signal a resurgence of COVID itself.翻译:科学家表示，这两个警报的相似性引发了人们毫无根据的担忧，即这种激增可能是由另一种可能引发大流行的新兴病原体引起的。他们表示，根据迄今为止的信息，这更有可能是流感等其他常见呼吸道感染的增加，就像新冠疫情封锁解除后世界许多地区所看到的那样。这也可能预示着新冠疫情本身的卷土重来。

The WHO always requests information from countries when undiagnosed or unknown diseases are reported, which happens fairly regularly. However, it does not always put out a press release about doing so, as it did on Wednesday.翻译:当报告未确诊或未知疾病时，世界卫生组织总是要求各国提供信息，这种情况经常发生。然而，它并不总是像周三那样发布有关这样做的新闻稿。

Brian McCloskey, a public health expert who also advised WHO on the pandemic, said: "What we are seeing is WHO's International Health Regulations system in action", referring to the rules governing how countries work with WHO on potential outbreaks.翻译:公共卫生专家布莱恩·麦克洛斯基(Brian McCloskey)也曾就这一流行病向世卫组织提供建议，他说：“我们看到的是世卫组织的国际卫生条例体系正在发挥作用”，他指的是指导各国如何与世卫组织合作应对潜在疫情的规则。

"I am not going to push the pandemic panic button on the basis of what we know so far, but I will be very keen to see the response to WHO from China and see the WHO’s assessment following that," he said.翻译:他说：“根据目前所知的情况，我不会按下大流行恐慌按钮，但我非常希望看到中国对世卫组织的反应，以及世卫组织随后的评估。”

Both the WHO and China have faced questions over transparency during the early days of COVID. WHO has also since criticised China for withholding data about infections and deaths when it lifted its "zero-COVID" measures, as well as about the origins of the pandemic.翻译:在新冠疫情爆发初期，世界卫生组织和中国都面临着透明度问题。此后，世卫组织还批评中国在取消“零新冠”措施时隐瞒了有关感染和死亡人数以及大流行起源的数据。

China has 24 hours to respond to the WHO under the regulations.翻译:根据规定，中国有24小时的时间向世界卫生组织作出反应。

But some said it was unclear if the illnesses reported were actually undiagnosed. The story which sparked the ProMED alert came from FTV News in Taiwan on Tuesday. In China itself, there has been a lot of recent coverage of a rise in respiratory illnesses, including among children.翻译:但一些人表示，尚不清楚所报告的疾病是否实际上未被确诊。周二，引发 ProMED警报的报道来自台湾 FTV 新闻。在中国，最近有很多报道称，呼吸道疾病（包括儿童）的发病率有所上升。

The authorities there have attributed it to the lifting of COVID-19 restrictions and the circulation of viruses like influenza as well as mycoplasma pneumoniae, a common bacterial infection that typically affects younger children.翻译:当地当局将其归因于取消 COVID-19 限制以及流感和肺炎支原体等病毒的传播，肺炎支原体是一种常见的细菌感染，通常会影响年幼的儿童。

"There is a plausible hypothesis that this could be what we have seen in other parts of the world when restrictions were lifted," said Koopmans, reflecting the views of all of the scientists Reuters contacted.翻译:库普曼斯说：“有一个似乎合理的假设，即解除限制后，这可能是我们在世界其他地区看到的情况。”这反映了路透社联系的所有科学家的观点。

Virologist Tom Peacock from Imperial College London, who has closely tracked the emergence of new coronavirus variants, said there were good tools available to "pretty rapidly" pick up emerging influenza or coronaviruses, so it seemed unlikely that this had happened under the radar.翻译:伦敦帝国理工学院的病毒学家汤姆·皮科克（Tom Peacock）密切跟踪新的冠状病毒变种的出现，他表示，有很好的工具可以“相当迅速”地识别新出现的流感或冠状病毒，因此这种情况似乎不太可能在雷达下发生。

"(I) suspect it may end up being something more mundane or a combination of things - say COVID, flu, RSV - but hopefully we'll know more soon," he said.翻译:“（我）怀疑它最终可能会变得更平常，或者是多种疾病的组合——比如新冠病毒、流感、呼吸道合胞病毒——但希望我们很快就能知道更多，”他说。

Reporting by Jennifer Rigby; editing by Jo Mason and Christina Fincher翻译:詹妮弗·里格比报道；乔·梅森和克里斯蒂娜·芬奇编辑

item.title: 中国称菲律宾利用外国势力在南海制造事端
item.description:
Summary:
  • China vows to defend its maritime rights, interests
  • Chinese navy shadowed joint patrol warships - Philippine military chief
  • Philippines has pursued warmer relations with U.S.
翻译:概括：
  • 中国誓言捍卫海洋权益
  • 中国海军跟踪菲律宾联合巡逻舰
  • 菲律宾寻求改善与美国的关系

The Philippines has enlisted "foreign forces" to patrol the South China Sea and has been stirring up trouble, China's military said on Thursday, referring to joint patrols this week by Philippine and U.S. forces.翻译:中国军方周四表示，菲律宾招募“外国军队”在南海巡逻，并不断滋事，指的是菲律宾和美国军队本周的联合巡逻。

The Chinese military will maintain high vigilance, resolutely defend sovereignty and maritime rights and interests, and resolutely safeguard peace and stability in the South China Sea, China's military said.翻译:中国军队将保持高度警惕，坚决捍卫主权和海洋权益，坚决维护南海和平稳定。

"The Philippines enlisted forces out of the region to patrol ... stirred up trouble and engaged in hype, undermining regional peace and stability," the southern theatre command of the Chinese military said.翻译:中国军队南部战区表示，菲律宾派兵出境巡逻……挑衅炒作，破坏地区和平稳定。

Philippine officials have said their military and the U.S. launched joint patrols on Tuesday in waters near Taiwan, a democratically governed island that China claims as its own, raising the possibility of further tensions with China.翻译:菲律宾官员表示，菲律宾军方和美国周二在台湾附近海域进行联合巡逻，中国宣称拥有台湾主权，这增加了与中国进一步紧张关系的可能性。

Relations have soured between China and the Philippines over the South China Sea under Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr as he pivots towards closer ties with the U.S., which supports the Southeast Asian nation in its maritime disputes with China.翻译:在菲律宾总统小费迪南德·马科斯（Ferdinand Marcos Jr）领导下，随着美国支持这个东南亚国家与中国的海事争端，与美国建立更紧密的关系，中国和菲律宾之间的关系在南海问题上恶化。

A Chinese foreign ministry spokesperson said on Wednesday China had warned the U.S. and the Philippines in connection with their patrols.翻译:中国外交部发言人周三表示，中国已就美国和菲律宾的巡逻活动向其发出警告。

"China has made clear its position to the Philippines and the U.S. that the Philippine-U.S. joint patrols must not undermine China's territorial sovereignty and maritime rights and interests," spokesperson Mao Ning said.翻译:毛宁表示，中方已向菲方和美方表明立场，菲美联合巡逻不得损害中国领土主权和海洋权益。

A Chinese navy ship shadowed three U.S. and Philippine warships conducting joint patrols on Thursday, the Philippine armed forces chief, Romeo Brawner, told reporters.翻译:菲律宾武装部队司令罗密欧·布劳纳告诉记者，周四，一艘中国海军舰艇跟踪了正在进行联合巡逻的三艘美国和菲律宾军舰。

The incident occurred at around 10:15 a.m. near the platform of a natural gas field 27 nautical miles off Palawan province, Brawner said. "There was no challenge, no dangerous manoeuvres."翻译:布劳纳说，这起事件发生在上午 10 点 15 分左右，距离巴拉望省 27 海里的一个天然气田平台附近。 “没有任何挑战，没有危险的动作。”

The Philippines achieved its goal of closely operating with its ally, the United States, and there was no untoward incident, Brawner added.翻译:布劳纳补充说，菲律宾实现了与其盟友美国密切合作的目标，没有发生任何不愉快的事件。

The Philippine foreign ministry and the national security adviser's office did not immediately respond to a request for comment.翻译:菲律宾外交部和国家安全顾问办公室没有立即回应置评请求。

Reporting by Ella Cao, Bernard Orr and Liz Lee in Beijing, Neil Jerome Morales in Manila; Editing by Edmund Klamann, Robert Birsel翻译:Ella Cao、Bernard Orr 和 Liz Lee 在北京的报道，Neil Jerome Morales 在马尼拉的报道；编辑：埃德蒙·克拉曼、罗伯特·伯塞尔

item.title: 中国财富管理公司中植宣布破产，负债640亿美元
item.description:
China's Zhongzhi Enterprise Group, a leading wealth manager, told investors it is heavily insolvent with up to $64 billion in liabilities, threatening to reignite concerns that the country's property debt crisis is spilling over into the broader financial sector.翻译:中国领先的财富管理公司中植企业集团告诉投资者，该公司严重资不抵债，负债高达640亿美元，这可能会再次引发人们对中国房地产债务危机蔓延到更广泛的金融领域的担忧。

The firm, which has sizable exposure to China's real estate sector, apologised to its investors in a letter that said it had total liabilities of about 420 billion yuan ($58 billion) to 460 billion yuan ($64 billion).翻译:该公司在中国房地产行业拥有相当大的敞口，在一封信中向投资者道歉，称其总负债约为人民币 4,​​200 亿元（约合 580 亿美元）至 4,600 亿元（约合 640 亿美元）。

The liabilities compared to Zhongzhi's estimated total assets of about 200 billion yuan, according to the letter, which was issued on Wednesday and was seen by Reuters.翻译:路透看到的周三发布的信函称，这些负债与中植估计的总资产约2000亿元人民币相比。

Beijing-based Zhongzhi did not immediately respond to a Reuters request for comment.翻译:总部位于北京的中植没有立即回应路透社的置评请求。

The worsening woes at Zhongzhi, a major player in China's $3 trillion shadow banking sector - roughly the size of the French economy - is set to rekindle worries about contagion, though some analysts expected regulators to step in to stem a wider fallout.翻译:中植银行是中国规模达3万亿美元的影子银行领域的主要参与者，规模相当于法国经济，其日益恶化的困境将重新引发人们对蔓延的担忧，尽管一些分析师预计监管机构将介入以遏制更广泛的影响。

China's highly indebted property sector has been reeling from a liquidity crunch since 2020. Defaults by developers since late 2021 have impeded economic growth and rattled global markets.翻译:自 2020 年以来，中国负债累累的房地产行业一直受到流动性紧缩的影响。自 2021 年底以来开发商的违约已经阻碍了经济增长，并扰乱了全球市场。

Shadow banking-linked wealth managers in China typically operate outside many of the rules governing commercial banks and mainly channel the proceeds of wealth products sold to retail investors to real estate developers and other sectors.

'ENORMOUS' HOLE

Signs of trouble at the Zhongzhi group first came to light in July when Zhongrong International Trust Co, a leading trust company controlled by Zhongzhi, missed payments on dozens of investment products.翻译:中植集团的麻烦迹象在7月份首次暴露出来，当时中植控股的一家领先信托公司中融国际信托公司拖欠了数十种投资产品的付款。

"The hole in its books is enormous," said Xu, who is an investor in a Zhongrong trust product and gave only her surname due to the sensitivity of the matter. "The firm has been in a mess."翻译:“账目上的漏洞是巨大的，”中融信托产品的投资者徐说，由于此事的敏感性，她只透露了自己的姓氏。 “公司已经一片混乱了。”

Zhongzhi, whose business interests span from mining to wealth management, said in the letter that as the group's assets were concentrated in long-term debt and equity investments it was difficult to liquidate them and book the returns.翻译:业务范围从矿业到财富管理的中植在信中表示，由于该集团的资产集中于长期债务和股权投资，因此难以变现并计入收益。

"Initial inspections show that the group is seriously insolvent and has significant continuing operational risks. The resources available for debt repayment in the short term are much lower than the group's overall debt scale," it said.翻译:初步检查显示，该集团严重资不抵债，存在重大持续经营风险，短期内可用于偿还债务的资源远低于集团整体债务规模。

"The Zhongzhi group deeply apologises for the losses caused to investors. We fully understand the urgency, importance and seriousness of resolving this overall risk," the group said in the letter.

HIGH DEFAULT RISKS

Zhongzhi had hired one of the Big Four accounting firms to conduct an audit of the firm, and was seeking strategic investors, its management told investors in a meeting in August, according to a video seen by Reuters at the time.翻译:根据路透社当时看到的一段视频，中植管理层在 8 月份的一次会议上告诉投资者，中植已聘请四大会计师事务所之一对该公司进行审计，并正在寻找战略投资者。

The underlying assets of Zhongrong trust are largely property related, which have high default risks, said Xing Zhaopeng, senior China strategist at ANZ.翻译:澳新银行高级中国策略师邢兆鹏表示，中融信托的基础资产主要与房地产相关，违约风险较高。

"The company cannot get the money back amid the property woes. So there are big discounts to its assets."翻译:“由于房地产陷入困境，该公司无法收回资金。因此其资产出现了大幅折扣。”

Starting off with timber and real estate trades in the 1990s, Zhongzhi quickly expanded into businesses ranging from chipmaking, healthcare, new energy vehicles and finance, according to its website.翻译:据其网站介绍，中植于20世纪90年代从木材和房地产贸易起步，迅速扩展到芯片制造、医疗保健、新能源汽车和金融等领域。

Its financial businesses include trust, asset management, insurance, futures, and wealth management.翻译:金融业务包括信托、资产管理、保险、期货、财富管理等。

Zhongzhi has been selling stakes in some listed companies it controlled over the past few years, and reducing the size of its business, after coming under pressure in the wake of China's crackdown on shadow banking, and the property market downturn.翻译:在中国打击影子银行和房地产市场低迷等压力下，中植过去几年一直在出售其控制的一些上市公司的股份，并缩小业务规模。

"Financial regulators are almost certain to intervene aggressively if there's any sign that Zhongzhi's troubles are spreading," said Christopher Beddor, deputy director of China research at Gavekal Dragonomics.翻译:“如果有任何迹象表明中植的问题正在蔓延，金融监管机构几乎肯定会大力干预，”龙洲经讯中国研究部副主任克里斯托弗·贝多尔(Christopher Beddor)表示。

He added that the trust industry is only about 5% of the total financial system, so problems there are not necessarily life-threatening.翻译:他补充说，信托业仅占整个金融体系的5%左右，因此出现问题并不一定会危及生命。

Beddor said the chance for investors to get full repayment of their investments is minimal. "Officials could certainly make retail investors whole if they want to, but they'd basically be turning their backs on years of attempts to undermine implicit guarantees. I suspect they won't."翻译:贝多尔表示，投资者获得全额投资回报的机会微乎其微。 “如果官员愿意的话，他们当然可以让散户投资者变得完整，但他们基本上会拒绝多年来破坏隐性担保的尝试。我怀疑他们不会。”

($1 = 7.2111 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2111 人民币）

Reporting by Ziyi Tang and Ryan Woo; Editing by Sumeet Chatterjee and Muralikumar Anantharaman翻译:唐子仪和吴瑞安报道；编辑：Sumeet Chatterjee 和 Muralikumar Anantharaman
